description: Strengthening institutional capacity for Disaster Risk Management in Viet Nam, including Climate Change related disasters

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description:
The project will achieve the following project outcomes:

- Strengthen the knowledge base on Disaster Risk Management in support of the formulation of national policies, regulations, action plans and investment plans on reduction of risks and recovery of households after major disasters, especially with regards to additional vulnerabilities as a result of Climate Change.

- Strengthen institutional structures and capacity for disaster preparedness and response in Viet Nam, specifically re Disaster Risk Management information; communication and awareness raising; analysis of vulnerabilities; and for formulation of specific investments.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
